p: Subfraction 30 eluted with the hexane–ethyl acetate mixture (3:7 v/v) was allowed to obtain a white crystalline precipitate with melting point (m.p.) 205–206 °C as measured in a Fisher-Johns apparatus (compound 1). Compound 1 was crystallized with methanol–acetone and analysed by ATR-IR, 13C NMR, 1H NMR (Advance DPX400 Bruker Spectrometer, Billerica, MA) at 400 MHz, Circular Dichroism (Jasco J-1500, JASCO Inc., Easton, MD) and crystallography (Bruker Smart APEX II model diffractometer, Billerica, MA).
